import React from "react" import { useField } from "../hooks" const CreateNew = (props) => { const content = useField("text") const author = useField("text") const info = useField("text") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.addNew({ content, author, info, votes: 0 }) } return (

create a new anecdote

content setContent(e.target.value)} />
author setAuthor(e.target.value)} />
url for more info setInfo(e.target.value)} />
) } export default CreateNew
